description.value:
Fairy culture focuses on beauty and harmony with the natural world, reveling in joy and amusement.

Fairy Magic. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.6C9dGOjAouC1mXP7]{Fairy Magic} You know the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.SbSvZKkJASyk8jKo]{Druidcraft} cantrip.

Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU]{Faerie Fire} spell with this trait. Starting at 5th level, you can also cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.WahI41a3goVUg0x1]{Enlarge/Reduce} spell with this trait. Once you cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU]{Faerie Fire} or @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.WahI41a3goVUg0x1]{Enlarge/Reduce} with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells when you cast them with this trait (choose when you select this race).

Reveler's Splendor. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.1pgrqIr3AF8ncRPq]{Reveler's Splendor} You have proficiency in the Performance skill.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
